Subject: Cease Fire ... Un-Ceased

::The Oblitercons/Firearm/Prowl::

Dark One and Firearm both jumped back from each other as they saw gunshots, 
looking down to see who had fired. Dark One growled.

"Breaking the treaty, eh, Maximal?" he snarled at Firearm, the Maximal 
shaking his head, trying to say it was the Alliance that had opened fire.

"Very well," Dark One said, "Face the wrath of ... OBLITERTRON!!"

The Oblitercons jumped into the air, transforming into different bodyparts. 
In a few seconds, Oblitertron stood his full height, looking down on all the 
other bots.

Simply swapping a surprized Firearm aside with his huge hand, Oblitertron 
yelled in rage, firing his optics at Prowl.
